markdownRemark.html:
In the spirit of new year, I decided to take Dan Abramov’s advice and start a blog, something I have procrastinated for so long.

Here I will be sharing my thoughts and the little things I’ve learned while learning and doing web development for over five years now.

In a way, I feel bad for not starting this sooner, I didn’t see the need until recently. but its better late than never. I hope that you or someone learn something from one or two posts that I will share here some day.

frontmatter.title: Things you need to start coding right away.
